product_name: Time ATAC XC 12 Titanium Carbon Bike Pedals
long_description: Time ATAC XC 12 clipless bike pedals feature light, compact and tough carbon fiber bodies and titanium axles for your cross-country, trail and cyclocross rides where every gram counts.
short_description: Time ATAC XC 12 clipless bike pedals feature light, compact and tough carbon fiber bodies and titanium axles for your cross-country, trail and cyclocross rides where every gram counts.
